room_title: Escape room "Rockstar: The Final Curtain" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
room_address: 2760 N Academy Blvd Suite 301 Colorado Springs, CO 80917
room_description:
At last, the day has arrived; your favorite band since high school, US THEM OR DEAN, is playing a show in your city for their final tour. Luckily, you and some other fan club members won backstage passes for this concert. As you wait to be escorted back by event staff, the air is buzzing with excitement.
Even the security guard is as eager for US THEM OR DEAN’S performance as you are. Opening the door to the dressing room, the guard leaves you for a moment.
Boom. A huge bang shakes the colosseum. A bomb has gone off.
You and the other fan club members rush backstage and are greeted with a disturbing video. A mad man who calls himself “The Puzzler” has a task for you. Solve the puzzles he has crafted within the hour or his second bomb will destroy the entire colosseum with you inside. Do you have what it takes to save the colosseum?
